channel.title: The Faithbuilders
channel.description:
Four ordinary gals bring you a passion, a devotion, and a faith that is extraordinary. With an easy style and down-home feel, these devotionals speak to real women with real life stuggles and triumphs. Save and share with all of your friends, just be sure to give credit.
Visit us at our website... www.thefaithbuilders.net
channel.itunes:subtitle: Digital Devotionals for Women on the Web
channel.itunes:author: Kim Estes
channel.itunes:summary:
Four ordinary gals bring you a passion, a devotion, and a faith that is extraordinary. With an easy style and down-home feel, these devotionals speak to real women with real life stuggles and triumphs. Save and share with all of your friends, just be sure to give credit.
Visit us at our website... www.thefaithbuilders.net

item.title: To Pray or To Punch
item.description: It can be incredibly difficult, as a parent, to watch our child suffer at the hands of a bully. We want to take action, to protect our child, to strike back at whatever and whoever is hurting our child. Kimberli Brackett, Faithbuilder Co-founder, shares her experience with this important issue in a humorous, but oh-so-honest way that will have you smiling, have you thinking, and hopefully...have you praying. What DO we do when faced with the option...to pray or to punch?
item.dc:creator: Kim Estes
item.itunes:summary: It can be incredibly difficult, as a parent, to watch our child suffer at the hands of a bully. We want to take action, to protect our child, to strike back at whatever and whoever is hurting our child. Kimberli Brackett, Faithbuilder Co-founder, shares her experience with this important issue in a humorous, but oh-so-honest way that will have you smiling, have you thinking, and hopefully...have you praying. What DO we do when faced with the option...to pray or to punch?

item.title: The Voice of Truth
item.description: Through the simple, heart-warming sound of her child singing, Faithbuilder Co-Founder Kimberli Brackett hears a message for all of us from our Heavenly Father to listen for the sound of his voice. It's hard to sort through the many voices screaming at us throughout the day, demanding our attention. God wants us to "choose to listen and believe the voice of truth.”
item.dc:creator: Kim Estes
item.itunes:summary: Through the simple, heart-warming sound of her child singing, Faithbuilder Co-Founder Kimberli Brackett hears a message for all of us from our Heavenly Father to listen for the sound of his voice. It's hard to sort through the many voices screaming at us throughout the day, demanding our attention. God wants us to "choose to listen and believe the voice of truth.”

item.title: The Faithbuilders - An Interview
item.description: Meet Co-Founders Kimberli Brackett, Tracy Crawford, Amie Newberry, and speaker Denise Jordan. The girls talk about faithbuilder events and the message they feel called to share with women everywhere. Join us for a chat!
item.dc:creator: Kim Estes
item.itunes:summary: Meet Co-Founders Kimberli Brackett, Tracy Crawford, Amie Newberry, and speaker Denise Jordan. The girls talk about faithbuilder events and the message they feel called to share with women everywhere. Join us for a chat!

item.title: Be Still And Know
item.description: Sometimes, God has to go to extremes to get our attention in our busy lives. With all the noise and the distractions, we often forget to be still and know that He is God. Faithbuilder Co-Founder Kimberli Brackett shares a humorous description of life in Noodle, Texas...and the wonderful extremes that God went to in order to get her to be still and hear his voice.
item.dc:creator: Kim Estes
item.itunes:summary: Sometimes, God has to go to extremes to get our attention in our busy lives. With all the noise and the distractions, we often forget to be still and know that He is God. Faithbuilder Co-Founder Kimberli Brackett shares a humorous description of life in Noodle, Texas...and the wonderful extremes that God went to in order to get her to be still and hear his voice.

item.title: The Chosen One
item.description: Doesn't it feel good when you are chosen for something? Chosen to be on the team, chosen as a friend, chosen for a special opportunity? Doesn't it feel horrible when you are the last person chosen? Faithbuilder member Denise Jordan reminds us all that we ARE chosen...by our Father, our Creator, by our God. It's time to not only start believing it...but living it.
item.dc:creator: Kim Estes
item.itunes:summary: Doesn't it feel good when you are chosen for something? Chosen to be on the team, chosen as a friend, chosen for a special opportunity? Doesn't it feel horrible when you are the last person chosen? Faithbuilder member Denise Jordan reminds us all that we ARE chosen...by our Father, our Creator, by our God. It's time to not only start believing it...but living it.

item.title: Game Over
item.description: Ever find yourself caught up in the Comparison Game? It's you and THEM...and either they don't measure up...or you don't. Kimberli Brackett, co-founder of The Faithbuilders, takes an honest look at why we play this game, who the real losers are, and how to hear the best words of all...Game Over.
item.dc:creator: Kim Estes
item.itunes:summary: Ever find yourself caught up in the Comparison Game? It's you and THEM...and either they don't measure up...or you don't. Kimberli Brackett, co-founder of The Faithbuilders, takes an honest look at why we play this game, who the real losers are, and how to hear the best words of all...Game Over.

item.title: The Movie Of Your Life
item.description: This devotional, written by Faithbuilders co-founder Kimberli Brackett, asks women to think about what rating the movie of THIER life would receive. Kimberli is honest and real about how we all can fall short of perfection, but through God's love and forgiveness we can earn that G rating - G for Grace.
